GV05brupsb4u:337: ato namaste 'stvime videhāstava yatheṣṭaṃ bhujyantāmayaṃ cāhamasmi dāsabhāve sthito yatheṣṭaṃ māṃ rājyaṃ ca pracatipadyasvetyarthaḥ //4,2.4//
GV05brupsb4u:343: atha ha yaj janakaś ca vaideho yājñavalkyaś cāgnihotre samūdāte /
GV05brupsb4u:347: taṃ ha samrāḍ eva pūrvaḥ papraccha // BrhUp_4,3.1 //
GV05brupsb4u:348: BrhUpBh_4,3.1 janakaṃ ha vaidehaṃ yājñavalkyo jagāmetyasyābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:349: vijñānamaya ātmā sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma sarvāntaraḥ para eva /
GV05brupsb4u:351: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭo vadanādiliṅgo 'sti vyatirikta iti madhukāṇḍe 'jātaśatrusaṃvāde
GV05brupsb4u:353: prāṇanādiliṅgo yaḥ sāmānyenādhigataḥ prāṇena prāṇitītyādinā dṛṣṭerdraṣṭetyādināluptaśaktisvabhāvo 'dhigataḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:354: tasya ca paropādhinimittaḥ saṃsāro yathā rajjūṣaraśuktikāgaganādiṣu sarpedakarajamalinatvādi
GV05brupsb4u:355: parādhyāropaṇanimittameva na svatastathā nirupādhiko nirupākhyo neti netīti vyapadeśyaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:356: sākṣādaparokṣātsarvāntara ātmā brahmākṣaramantaryāmī praśastaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣo vijñānamānandaṃ brahmetyadhigatam /
GV05brupsb4u:358: pareṇa jagadātmā prāṇopādhistato 'pi pravilāpya jagadātmānamupādhibhūtaṃ rajjvādāviva
GV05brupsb4u:359: sarpādikaṃ vidyayā sa eṣa neti netīti sākṣātsarvāntaraṃ brahmādhigatam /
GV05brupsb4u:361: atra ca jāgratsvapna suṣuptaturīyāṇyupanyanyaprasaṅgenendhaḥ praviviktāhārataraḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sa eṣa neti netīti /
GV05brupsb4u:362: idānīṃ jāgratsvapnādvāreṇāva mahatā tarkeṇa vistarato 'dhigamaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:370: sa ca gacchannevaṃ mene cintitavānna vadiṣye kiñcidapu rājñe /
GV05brupsb4u:372: na vadiṣya ityevaṃsaṃkalpo 'pi yājñavalkyo yadyajjanakaḥ pṛṣṭavāṃstattatpratipede tatra ko hetuḥ saṃkalpitasyānyathākaraṇa ityatrā'khyāyikāmācaṣṭe
GV05brupsb4u:373: pūrvatra kila janakayājñavalkyoḥ saṃvāda āsīdagnihotre nimitte /
GV05brupsb4u:374: tatra janakasyāgnihotraviṣayaṃ vijñānamupalabhya parituṣṭo yājñavalkyastasmai janakāya ha kila varandadau /
GV05brupsb4u:375: sa ca janako ha kāmapraśnameva varaṃ vavre vṛtavāṃstaṃ ca varaṃ hāsmai dadau yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:377: yājñavalkyaṃ tūṣṇaiṃ sthitamapi samrāḍeva janakaḥ pūrvaṃ papraccha /
GV05brupsb4u:380: svatantrā hi brahmavidyā sahakārisādhanāntaranirapekṣā puruṣārthasādhaneti ca //4,3.1//
GV05brupsb4u:384: ādityenaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brupsb4u:386: BrhUpBh_4,3.2 he yājñavalkyetyevaṃ saṃbodhyābhimukhīkaraṇāya kiñjyotirayaṃ puruṣa
GV05brupsb4u:387: iti kimasya puruṣasya jyotiryena jyotiṣā vyavaharati so 'yaṃ kiñjyotirayaṃ prākṛtaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:389: kimayaṃ svāvayavāsaṃghātabāhyena jyotirantareṇa vyavaharatyāhosvitsvāvayavasaṃghātamadhyapātinā jyotiṣā jyotiṣkāryamayaṃ puruṣo nirvartayatītyetadabhipretya pṛcchati /
GV05brupsb4u:390: kiñcāto yadi vyatiriktena yadi vāvyatiriktena-jyotiṣā jyotiṣkāryaṃ nirvartayati /
GV05brupsb4u:391: śṛṇu tatra kāraṇam yadi vyatiriktenaivajyotiṣā jyotiṣkāryanirvartakatvamasya svabhāvo
GV05brupsb4u:393: athāvyatiriktenaiva svātmanā jyotiṣā vyavaharati tato 'pratyakṣe 'pi jyotiṣi jyotiṣkāryadarśane 'byatiriktameva jyotiranumeyam /
GV05brupsb4u:394: athāniyama eva vyatiriktamavyatiriktaṃ vā jyotiḥ puruṣasya vyavahārahetustato 'nadhyavasāya
GV05brupsb4u:395: eva jyotirviṣaya ityevaṃ manvānaḥ pṛcchati janako yājñavalkyaṃ kiñjyotirayaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:396: nanvevamanumānakauśale janakasya kiṃ praśnena svayameva kasmānna pratipadyata iti /
GV05brupsb4u:399: ata eva hi dharmasūkṣmanirṇaye pariṣadvyāpāra iṣyate /
GV05brupsb4u:402: tasmādyadyapyanumānakauśalaṃ rājñastathāpi tu yukto yājñavalkyaḥ praṣṭum /
GV05brupsb4u:405: yājñavalkyo 'pi janakābhiprāyabhijñatayā vyatiriktamātmajyotirbodhayiṣyañjanakaṃ vyatiriktapratipādakameva liṅgaṃ pratipede yathā prasiddhamādityajyotiḥ samrāḍiti hovāca /
GV05brupsb4u:408: puruṣa āsta upaviśati palyayate prayeti kṣetramaraṇyaṃ vā tatra gatvā karma bāhyanekajyotiḥpradarśanaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:412: astamita āditye yājñavalkya kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:414: candramasaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brupsb4u:416: BrhUpBh_4,3.3 tathāstamita āditye yājñavalkya kiñjyotirevāyaṃ puruṣa iti candramā evāsya jyotiḥ //4,3.3//
GV05brupsb4u:418: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:420: agninaiva jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brupsb4u:424: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite śānte 'gnau kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:426: vācaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyeti /
GV05brupsb4u:427: tasmād vai samrāḍ api yatra svaḥ pāṇir na vinirjñāyate 'tha yatra vāg uccaraty upaiva tatra nyetīti /
GV05brupsb4u:429: BrhUpBh_4,3.5 śānte 'gnau vāgjyotiḥ vāgiti śabdaḥ parigṛhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:434: kathaṃ purvāgjyotiriti vācojyotiṣṭvamaprasiddhamityata āha-tasmādvai samrāḍyasmādvācā jyotiṣānugṛhīto 'yaṭaṃ puruṣo vyavaharati tasmātprasiddhametadvāco jyotiṣṭvam /
GV05brupsb4u:435: kathamapi yatra yasminkāle prāvṛṣi prāyeṇa medhāndhakāre sarvajyotiḥpratyastamaye svo 'pi prāṇirhasto na vispaṣṭaṃ nirjñāyate /
GV05brupsb4u:436: atha tasminkāle sarvaceṣṭānirodhe prāpte bāhyajyotiṣo 'bhāvādyatra vāguccarati śvā
GV05brupsb4u:437: vā bhaṣati gardabho vā rautyupaiva tatra nyeti tena śabdena jyotiṣā śrotramanasornairantayaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:438: bhavati tena jyotiṣkāryatvaṃ vākpratipadyeta tena vācā jyotiṣopanyetyevopagacchatyeva
GV05brupsb4u:446: astamita āditye yājñavalkya candramasy astamite śānte 'gnau śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:448: ātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣāste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti // BrhUp_4,3.6 //
GV05brupsb4u:449: BrhUpBh_4,3.6 śāntāyā punarvāci gandhādiṣvapi ca śānteṣu /
GV05brupsb4u:452: jāgradviṣaye bahirmukhānu karaṇāni cakṣurādīnyādityādijyotirbhiranugṛhyāmāṇāni yadā tadā sphuṭataraḥ saṃvyavahāro 'sya puruṣasyadṛṣṭā /
GV05brupsb4u:453: tasmātte vayaṃ manyāmahe sarvabāhyajyotiḥpratyastamaye 'pi svapnasuṣuptakāle jāgarite ca tādṛgavasthāyāṃ svāvayavasaṃghātavyatiriktenaiva jyotiṣā jyotiṣkāryasiddhirasyeti /
GV05brupsb4u:462: dṛṣṭaṃ na tu tathā taccakṣurādibhirupalabhyata ādityādijyotiḥṣūparateṣu /
GV05brupsb4u:463: kāryaṃ tu jyotiṣo dṛśyote yasmāttasmādātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣā'ste palyayate karma kurute vipalyetīti /
GV05brupsb4u:465: kiñcā'dityādijyotirvilakṣaṇaṃ tadabhautikaṃ ca sa eva heturyaccakṣurādyagrāhyamādityādivat / na /
GV05brupsb4u:467: ādityādijyotiṣā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasya bhautikasya bhautikenaivopakāraḥ kriyamāṇo dṛśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:473: kāryakaraṇasaṃghātabhāvabhāvitvācca saṃghātadharmatvamanumīyate jyotiṣaḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya cānumānasya vyabhicāritvādaprāmāṇyam /
GV05brupsb4u:474: sāmānyato dṛṣṭabalena hi bhavānādityādivadvyatiriktaṃ jyotiḥ sādhayati kāryakaraṇebhyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:476: ayameva tu kāryakaraṇasaṃghātaḥ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati śṛṇoti manute vijānāti ca /
GV05brupsb4u:477: yadi nāma jyotirantaramasyopakārakaṃ syādādityādivanna tadā'tmā syajyotirantaramādityādivadeva /
GV05brupsb4u:478: ya eva tu pratyakṣaṃ darśanakriyāṃ karoti sa evā'tmā syātkāryakaraṇasaṃghāto nānyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:480: nanvayameva ceddarśanādikrāyakartā'tmā saṃghātaḥ kathamavikalasyaivāsya darśanādikriyākartṛtvaṃ kadācidbhavati kadācinneti /
GV05brupsb4u:486: na ca padārthasvabhāvo nāsti na hyagneruṣṇasvābhāvyamanyanimittamudakasya vā śaityam /
GV05brupsb4u:492: yaduktaṃ svabhāvavādinā dehasyaiva darśanādikriyā na vyatiriktasyeti /
GV05brupsb4u:494: yadi hi dehasyaiva darśanādikriyā svapne dṛṣṭasyaiva darśanaṃ na syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:495: andhaḥ svapnaṃ paśyandṛṣṭapūrvameva paśyati na śākadvīpādigatamadṛṣṭarūpam /
GV05brupsb4u:496: tataścetatsiddhaṃ bhavati yaḥ svapne paśyati dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ vastu sa eva pūrvaṃ vidyamāne cakṣuṣyadrākṣīnna deha iti /
GV05brupsb4u:497: dehaśceddraṣṭāsa yenādrākṣīttasminnuddhṛte cakṣuṣi svapne tadeva dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na paśyet /
GV05brupsb4u:498: asti ca loke prasiddhiḥ pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayā himavataḥ śṛṅgamadyāhaṃ svapne 'drākṣamityuddhṛtacakṣuṣāmandhānāmapu /
GV05brupsb4u:499: tasmādanuddhṛte 'pi cakṣuṣiḥ yaḥ svapnadṛksa eva draṣṭā na deha ityavagamyate /
GV05brupsb4u:500: tathā smṛtau dṛṣṭṛsmartrorekatve sati ya eva draṣṭāsa eva smartā yadā caivaṃ tadā nimīlitākṣo 'pi smandṛṣṭapūrvaṃ yadrūpaṃ taddṛṣṭavadeva paśyatīti
GV05brupsb4u:501: tasmādyannimīlitaṃ tanna draṣṭṛyannimīlite cakṣuṣi smaradrūpaṃ paśyati tadevānimīlite 'pi cakṣuṣi draṣṭrāsīdityavagamyate /
GV05brupsb4u:503: devasyaiva draṣṭrutve mṛte 'pi darśanādi kriyā syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:504: tasmādyapāye dehe darśanaṃ na bhavati .dbhāve ca bhavati taddarśanādikriyākartṛ na deva ityavagamyate /
GV05brupsb4u:515: na ca tāvatā tatsamānajātīyairevāgneḥ prajvanopakāraḥ sarvatrānumeyaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:516: yenodakenāpi prajvalanopakāro bhinnajātīyona vaidyutasyāgnerjāṭharasya ca kriyamāṇo dṛśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:520: yatpunarāttha cakṣurādibhirādityādijyotirvadadṛśyatvādityayaṃ heturjyotirantarasyāntaḥsthatvaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca na sādhayati cakṣurādibhiranaikāntikatvāditi
GV05brupsb4u:525: ādityādijyotirvatkāryakaraṇasaṃghātādarthāntaraṃ jyotiriti hyanumānamuktaṃ tena virudhyata iyaṃ pratijñā kārayakaraṇasaṃghātadharmatvaṃ jyotiṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:529: pānabhojanādiṣu hi kṣutpipāsādinivṛttimupalabdhavasastatsāmānyātpānabhojanādyupādānaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ loke na prāpnoti /
GV05brupsb4u:530: dṛśyante hyupalabdhapānabhojanāḥ sāmānyataḥ punaḥ pānabhojanāntaraiḥ kṣutpipāsādinivṛttimanuminvantastādartheyana pravartamānāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:531: yaduktamayameva tu deho darśanādikriyākarteti tatprathamameva parihṛtaṃ svapnasmṛtyordehādarthāntarabhūto draṣṭeti /
GV05brupsb4u:540: katama ātmeti -- yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdy antarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:541: sa samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva /
GV05brupsb4u:542: sa hi svapno bhūtvemaṃ lokam atikrāmati add. mṛtyo rūpāṇi // BrhUp_4,3.7 //
GV05brupsb4u:543: BrhUpBh_4,3.7 yadyapi vyatiriktatvādi siddhaṃ tathāpi samānajātīyānugrāhakatvadarśananimittabhrāntyā karaṇānāmevānyatamo vyatirikto vetyavivekataḥ pṛcchati-katama iti /
GV05brupsb4u:545: athavā śarīravyatirikte siddhe 'pi karaṇānu sarvāṇi vijñānavantīva vivekata ātmano 'nupalabdhatvāt /
GV05brupsb4u:550: sarva ime prāṇā vijñānamayā ivaiṣu prāṇeṣu katamaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:551: yathā samuditeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu sarva ime tejasvinaḥ katama eṣu ṣaḍaṅgaviditi /
GV05brupsb4u:552: pūrvasminvyākhyāne katama ātmetyetāvadeva praśnavākyaṃ vijñānamayo hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥkatama ityedatantam /
GV05brupsb4u:553: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamaya ityetasyaśabdasya sarvameva praśnavākyaṃ vijñānamayo hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ katama ityedatantam /
GV05brupsb4u:554: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamaya ityetasya śabdasya nirdhāritārthaviśeṣaviṣayatvaṃ katama ātmetītiśabdasya
GV05brupsb4u:556: ātmetyevamantameva praśnavākyaṃ yo 'yamityādi paraṃ sarvameva prativacanamiti niścīyate /
GV05brupsb4u:559: buddhivijñāna saṃpṛkta eva hi yasmādupalabhyate rāhuriva candrādityasaṃpṛktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:562: buddhivijñānālokaviśiṣṭameva hi sarvaṃ viṣayajātamupalabhyate purovasthitapradīpālokaviśiṣṭamiva tamasi /
GV05brupsb4u:565: yeṣāṃ paramātmavijñaptivikāra iti vyākhyānaṃ teṣāṃ vijñānamayo manomaya ityādau vijñānamayaśabdasyānyārthadarśanādaśrautārthatāvasīyate /
GV05brupsb4u:570: prāṇeṣviti vyatirekapradarśārthā saptamī yathā vṛkṣeṣu pāṣāṇa iti sāmīpyalakṣaṇā /
GV05brupsb4u:573: yo hi yeṣu bhavati sa tadvyatirikto bhavatyeva /
GV05brupsb4u:575: hṛdi tatrātatsyātprāṇeṣu prāṇajātīyaiva buddhiḥ syādityata āha-hṛdyantariti /
GV05brupsb4u:579: tena hyavabhāsakenā'tmanā jyotiṣā'ste palyayate karma kurute cenāvāniva hyayaṃ kāryakaraṇapiṇḍo
GV05brupsb4u:580: yathā'dityaprakāśastho ghaṭo yathā marakatādirmaṇiḥ kṣīrādidravye prakṣiptaḥ parīkṣaṇāyātmacchāyameva
GV05brupsb4u:592: tena hi sarvasya lokasya kāryakaraṇasaṃghāte tadvṛttiṣu cāniyatā'tmābhimānabuddhiryathāvivekaṃ jāyate /
GV05brupsb4u:593: tathā ca bhagavatoktaṃ gītāsu-“yathā prakāśayatyekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokamimaṃ raviḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:594: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārati” //
GV05brupsb4u:596: “nityo 'nityānāṃ cenaścetanānāṃ“iti ca kāṭhake“tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti“iti ca /
GV05brupsb4u:599: puruṣa ākāśavatsarvagatvātpūrṇa iti puruṣaḥ niratiśayaṃ cāsya svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ sarvāvabhāsakatvātsvayamanyānavabhāsyatvācca /
GV05brupsb4u:600: sa eṣa puruṣaḥ svayameva jyotiḥsvabhāvo yaṃ tvaṃ pṛcchasi katama ātmeti /
GV05brupsb4u:601: bāhyānāṃ jyotiṣāṃ sarvakaraṇānugrāhakāṇāṃ pratyastamaye 'ntaḥkaraṇadvāreṇa hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣa ātmānugrāhakaḥ karaṇānāmityuktam /
GV05brupsb4u:610: śakyate tajjyotirātmākhyaṃ muñjeṣīkāvanniṣkṛṣya darśayitumityataḥ svapne didarśayiṣuḥ
GV05brupsb4u:612: yaḥ puruṣaḥ svayameva jyotirātmā sa samānaḥ sadṛśaḥ san /
GV05brupsb4u:615: hṛdīti ca hṛcchabdavācyā buddhaḥ prakṛtā sannihitā ca /
GV05brupsb4u:617: kiṃ punaḥ sāmānyamaśvamahiṣavadvivekato 'nupalabdhiḥ avabhāsyā buddhirabhāsakaṃ tadātmajyotirālokavat /
GV05brupsb4u:621: yathā haritaṃ nīlaṃ lohitaṃ cāvabhāsayannā4lokastatsamāno bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:625: tenāsau kutaścitpravabhajya muñjeṣīkāvatsvena jyotīrūpeṇa darśayituṃ na śakyata iti
GV05brupsb4u:626: sarvavyāpāraṃ tatrādhyāropya nāmarūpagataṃ jyotirdharmaṃ ca nāmarūpayornāmarūpe cā'tmajyotiṣi
GV05brupsb4u:627: sarvo loko momugyate 'yamātmā nāyamāmtaivandharmā naivadharmā kartākartā śuddho 'śuddho
GV05brupsb4u:628: baddho muktaḥ sthito gata āgato 'sti nāstītyādivikalpaiḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:631: tatra nāmarūpopādhisādṛśyaṃ bhrāntinimittaṃ yattadeva heturna svata ityetaducyate /
GV05brupsb4u:632: yasmātsa samānaḥ sannubhau lokāvanukrameṇa sañcarati tadetatpratyakṣamityetaddarśayati-yato
GV05brupsb4u:633: dhyāyatīva dhyānavyāpāraṃ karotīva cintayatīva dhyānavyāpavatīṃ buddhiṃ sa tatsthena
GV05brupsb4u:638: teṣveva karameṣu buddhyādiṣu vāyuṣu ca calatsu tadavabhāsakatvāttatsadṛśaṃ taditi lelāyatīva /
GV05brupsb4u:640: kathaṃ punaretadavagamyate tatsamānatvabhrāntirevobhayalokasaṃcaraṇādirhetutvaṃ svata ityasyārthasya pradarśanāya hetarupadiśyate- sa ātmā hi yasmātsvapno bhūtvā /
GV05brupsb4u:641: sa yayā dhiyā samānaḥ sā dhīryadyadbhavati tattadasāvapu bhavatīva tasmādyadāsau svapno bhavati svāpavṛttiṃ pratipadyate dhīstadā so 'pi svapnavṛttiṃ pratipadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:642: dā dhīrjajāgariṣati tadāsāvapyata āha-svapno bhūtvā svapnavṛttimavabhāsayandhiyaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:648: mṛtyorūpā ṇi mṛtyuḥ karmāvidyādirna tasyānyadrūpaṃ svataḥ kāryakaraṇānyevāsya rūpāṇi /
GV05brupsb4u:650: nanu nāstyeva dhiyā samānamanyaddhiyo 'vabhāsakamātmajyotiḥ pratyakṣeṇa vānumānena palambhāt /
GV05brupsb4u:654: tatra bhavatvanyatvenā'lokasyopambhādghaṭādeḥ saṃśliṣṭayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ bhinnayoreva na ca tatheha ghaṭāderiva dhiyoṣa'vabhāsakaṃ jyotirintaraṃ pratyakṣeṇa vānumānena vopalabhāmahe /
GV05brupsb4u:656: tasmānnānumānato nāpi pratyakṣato dhiyo 'vabhāsakaṃ jyotiḥ śakyate pratipādayituṃ vyatiriktam /
GV05brupsb4u:662: yadevaṃ tadā na bāhyo dṛṣṭānto 'sti vijñānalakṣaṇamātratvātsarvasya /
GV05brupsb4u:663: eṃ tasyava vijñānas grāhyāgrāhakākāratāmalaṃ pakarikalpya tasyaiva punarviśuddhaṃ parikalpayanti /
GV05brupsb4u:664: tadgrāhakavinirmuktaṃ vijñānaṃ svacchībhūtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ vyavatiṣṭhata iti kecit /
GV05brupsb4u:666: tadapi vijñānaṃ saṃvṛtaṃ grāhyagrāhakāṃśavinirumuktaṃ śūnyameva ghaṭādibāhyavastuvadityapare mādhyamikā ācakṣate /
GV05brupsb4u:667: sarvā etāḥ kalpanā buddhavijñānāvabhāsakasya vyatiriktasyā'tmajyotiṣo 'pahnavādasya śreyomārgasya pratipakṣabhūtā vaidikasya /
GV05brupsb4u:671: pradīpādyālokasaṃyogena tu niyamenaivāvabhāsyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ sāloko ghaṭa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:672: saṃśliṣṭayorapu ghaṭālokayoranyatvameva punaḥ punaḥ saṃśleṣe viśleṣe ca viśeṣadarśanādrajjughaṭayoriva /
GV05brupsb4u:673: anyatve ca vyatiriktāvabhāsakatvaṃ na svātmanaiva svamātmānamavabhāsayati /
GV05brupsb4u:678: yadyapi pradīpo 'nyasyāvabhāsakaḥ svayamavabhāsātkatvāttathāpu vyatiriktacaitanyāvabhāsyatvaṃ na vyabhicarati ghaṭādivadeva /
GV05brupsb4u:680: nanu yathā ghaṭaścaitanyāvabhāsyatve 'pi sannātmānaṃ ghaṭaṃ cāvabhāsayati / na /
GV05brupsb4u:682: yathā caitanyāvabhāsyatvaṃ ghaṭasya tathā pradīpasyāpi caitanyāvabhāsyatvamaviśiṣṭam /
GV05brupsb4u:683: yattūcyate pradīpa ātmānaṃ ghaṭaṃ cāvabhāsayatīti tadasat /
GV05brupsb4u:686: na hi tadā pradīpasya svato vā parato vā viśeṣaḥ kaścidupalabhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:687: sa hyavabhāsyo bhavati yasyāvabhāsakasaṃnidhāvasaṃnidhau ca viśeṣa ātmānaṃ pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti mṛṣaivācyot /
GV05brupsb4u:691: caitanyagrāhyatve ca vijñānasya kiṃ grāhyavijñānagrāhyataiva kiṃvā grāhakavijñānagrāhyateti
GV05brupsb4u:692: tatrasaṃdihyamāne vastuni yo 'nyatra dṛṣṭo nyāyaḥ sa kalpayituṃ yukto na tu dṛṣṭaviparītaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:693: tathā ca sati yathā vyitiriktenaiva grāhakeṇa bāhyānāṃ pradīpānāṃ grāhyatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:696: yaśvānyo vijñānasya grahītā sa ātmā jyotirantaraṃ vijñānāt /
GV05brupsb4u:698: naḥ grāhyatvamātra hi tadgrāhakasya vastvantaratve liṅgamuktaṃ nyāyataḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:699: na tvekāntato grāhakatve tadgrāhakāntarāstitve vā kadācidapi liṅgaṃ saṃbhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:704: yatra vastvantareṇa gṛhyate vastvantaraṃ tatragrāhyagrāhakavyatiriktaṃ karaṇāntaraṃ syāditi naikāntena niyantuṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb4u:707: ghaṭastāvatsvātmavyatiriktenā'tmanā gṛhyate tatpa pradīpādirāloko grāhyagrāhakavyatiriktaṃ karaṇam /
GV05brupsb4u:709: ghaṭavaccakṣurgrāhyatve 'pi pradīpasya cakṣuḥ pradīpavyatirekeṇa na bāhyamālokasthānīyaṃ kiñcitkaraṇāntaramapekṣate /
GV05brupsb4u:710: tasmānnaiva niyantuṃ śakyate yatra yatra vyatiriktagrāhakagrāhyatvaṃ tatra tatra karaṇāntaraṃ syādeveti /
GV05brupsb4u:711: tasmādvijñānasya vyaktiriktagrāhakagrāhyatve na karaṇadvārānavasthā nāpi grāhakatvadvārā kadācidapyupapādayituṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb4u:713: nanu nāstyeva bāhyor'tho ghaṭādiḥ pradīpo vā vijñānavyatiriktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:714: yaddhi yadvyatirekeṇa nopalamyate tattāvanmātraṃ vastu dṛṣṭam /
GV05brupsb4u:716: tathā jāgarite 'pi ghaṭapradīpāderjāgarite 'pi ghaṭapradīpāderjāgradvijñānamātrameva tu sarvam /
GV05brupsb4u:717: tatra yaduktaṃ vijñānasya vyatiriktāvabhāsyatvādvijñānavyatiriktamasti jyotirantaraṃ gaṭāderiveti tanmithyā /
GV05brupsb4u:722: vijñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ pradīpa iti ca śabdārthapṛthaktvādyāvattāvajadapi bāhyamarthāntaramavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
GV05brupsb4u:723: vijñānādarthāntaraṃ vastu na cedabhyupagamyate vijñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa ityevamādīnāṃ bhabdānāmekārthatve paryāyaśabdatvaṃ prāpnoti /
GV05brupsb4u:729: na hyātmīyaṃ vijñāna nirākartavyamabhyupagamyate svayaṃ vā'tmā kasyacit /
GV05brupsb4u:731: na ca pravādyādayaḥ svātmanaiva gṛhyanta ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:735: tasmādvijñānavādināpi na śakyaṃ vijñānavyatiriktaṃ jyotirantaraṃ nirākartum /
GV05brupsb4u:738: bhavataiva viṣayo ghaṭādiryadyabhāvo yadi vā bhāvaḥ syādubhayathāpi ghaṭādivijñānasya bhāvabhūtatvamabhyupagatameva /
GV05brupsb4u:742: yattūktaṃ sāloko 'nyaścānyaśca ghaṭo jāyata iti tadasat /
GV05brupsb4u:743: kṣaṇāntare 'pi sa evāyaṃ ghaṭa iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GV05brupsb4u:749: na hi dṛśyamānalūnotthitakeśanakhādiṣu vyaktinimittaḥ sa eveti pratyayo bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:752: pratyakṣeṇa hi pratyabhijñāyamāne vastuni tadeveti na cānyatvamanumātuṃ yuktaṃ pratyakṣavirodhe liṅgasyā'bhāsatvopapatteḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:755: ekasya hi vastudarśino vastvantaradarśane sādṛśyapratyayaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:760: teneti dṛṣṭaṃ smṛtvā yāvadidimiti vartamānakṣaṇakālamavatiṣṭheta tataḥ kṣaṇikavādahāniḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:761: atha tenetyavopakṣīṇaḥ smārtaḥ pratyaya idamiti cānya eva vārtamānikaḥ pratyayaḥ kṣīyate tataḥ sādṛśyapratyatānupapattistenedaṃ sadṛśamiti /
GV05brupsb4u:765: athādṛṣṭavato vyapadeṣaḥ sādṛśyapratyayaśca tadānūṃ jātyandhasyeva rūpaviśeṣavyapadeśastatsādṛśyapratyayaśca sarvamandhaparampareti prasajyeta sarvajñaśāstrapraṇayanādi /
GV05brupsb4u:768: dṛṣṭavyapadeśahetuḥ pūrvettarasahita eka eva hi śṛṅgalāvatpratyayo jāyata iti cet /
GV05brupsb4u:771: tatra vartamānapratyaya ekaḥ śṛṅgalāvayavasthānīyo 'tītaścāparastau pratyayau bhinnakālau
GV05brupsb4u:775: sarvasya ca svasaṃvedyavijñānamātratve vijñānasya ca svacchāvabodhābhāsamātrasvābhāvyābhyupagamāttaddarśinaścānyasyābhāve 'nityaduḥkha- śūnyānātmatvādyanekakalpanānupattiḥ
GV05brupsb4u:782: na tusvābhāvikena raktatvādīnāṃ dravyāntarayogena viyojanaṃ dṛśyate tatrāpi saṃyogapūrvatvamanumīyate /
GV05brupsb4u:786: viṣayaviṣayyābhāsatvaṃ ca yanmalaṃ parikalpyate vijñānasya tadapyanyasaṃsargābhāvādānupapannam /
GV05brupsb4u:788: asati cānyasaṃsargeyo dharmo yasya dṛṣṭaḥ sa tatsvabhātvānna tena viyogamarhati /
GV05brupsb4u:790: tasmādanityasaṃsargeṇa malinatvaṃ tadviśuddhiśca vijñānasyetīyaṃ kalpanāndhaparamparaiva pramāṇaśūnyetyavagamyate /
GV05brupsb4u:791: yadapi tasya vijñānasya nirvāṇaṃ puruṣārthaṃ kalpayanti tatrāpi phalāśrayānupapattiḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:792: kaṇṭakaviddhasya hi kaṇṭakavedhajanitaduḥkhanivṛttiḥ phalaṃ na tu kaṇṭakaviddhamaraṇe tadduḥkhanivṛttaphalasyā'śraya upapadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:794: yasya hi puruṣaśabdavācyasya satvasyātmano vijñānasya cārthaḥ parikalpyate tasya punaḥ puruṣasya nirvāṇe kasyārthaḥ puruṣārtha iti syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:795: yasya punarastyanekārthadaśīṃ vijñānavyatirikta ātmā tasya dṛṣṭasmaraṇadukhasaṃyogaviyogādi sarvamevopapannamanyasaṃyoganimittaṃ kāluṣyaṃ tadviyoganimittā ca viśuddhiriti /
GV05brupsb4u:796: śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nā'daraḥ kriyate //4,3.7//
GV05brupsb4u:798: sa vā ayaṃ puruṣo jāyamānaḥ śarīram abhisampadyamānaḥ pāpmabhiḥ saṃsṛjyate /
GV05brupsb4u:799: sa utkrāman mriyamāṇaḥ pāpmano vijahāti // BrhUp_4,3.8 //
GV05brupsb4u:800: BrhUpBh_4,3.8 yathaivehaikasmindehe svapno bhūtvā mṛtyo rūpāṇi kāryakaraṇānyatikramya svapne sva ātmajyetiṣyāsta evaṃ sa vai prakṛtaḥ puruṣo 'jāyamānaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:801: kathaṃ jāyamāna ityucyate-śarīraṃ dehendriyasaṃghātamabhisaṃpadyamānaḥ śarīra ātmabhāvamāpadyamāna ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:806: tathā so 'yaṃ puruṣa ubhāvihalokaparokau janmamaraṇābhyāṃ kāryakaraṇopādānaparityāgāvanavarataṃ pratipadyamāna ā saṃsāramokṣātsaṃcarati /
GV05brupsb4u:808: na hi taddharmatve sati taireva saṃyogo viyogo vā yuktaḥ //4,3.8//
GV05brupsb4u:810: tasya vā etasya puruṣasya dve eva sthāne bhavataḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:813: tasminsandhye sthāne tiṣṭhan ubhe sthāne paśyatīdaṃ ca paralokasthānaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb4u:815: tam ākramam ākramyobhayān pāpmana ānandāṃś ca paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:816: sa yatra prasvapity asya lokasya sarvāvato mātrām apādāya svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā svena jyotiṣā prasvapiti /
GV05brupsb4u:818: BrhUpBh_4,3.9 nanu na syo 'syobhau lokau yau janmamaraṇābhyāmanukrameṇa saṃcarati svapnajāgarite iva /
GV05brupsb4u:819: svapnajāgarite tu pratyakṣamavagamyete na tvihalokaparalokau kenacitpramaṇena /
GV05brupsb4u:821: ucyate-tasyaitasya puruṣasya vai dve e sthāne bhavato na tṛtacīyaṃ caturthaṃ vā /
GV05brupsb4u:823: idaṃ ca .tpratipannaṃ vartamānaṃ janma śarīrenjadriyaviṣayavedanāviśiṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ pratyakṣato 'nubhūyamānam /
GV05brupsb4u:826: nanu svapno 'pi paralokasthā ca sati dve evetyavadhāraṇamayuktam / na /
GV05brupsb4u:831: na hi grāmayoḥ saṃdhastāveva grāmāvapekṣya tṛtīyatvaparigaṇanamarhati /
GV05brupsb4u:832: kathaṃ punastasya paralokasthāsyāstitvamavagamyate yadapekṣya svapnasthānaṃ saṃdhyaṃ bhavet /
GV05brupsb4u:833: yatastasminsaṃdhye svapnasthāne tiṣṭanbhavanvartamāna ete ubhe sthāne paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:836: tasmātstaḥ svapnajāgaritavyatirekeṇobhau lokau yo dhiyā samānaḥ sannanusaṃcarati janmamaraṇasaṃtānaprabandhena /
GV05brupsb4u:837: kathaṃ punaḥ svapne sthitaḥ lokau paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:842: ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paralokasthāne pratipattavye nimitte yathākramo bhavati yādṛśenaparalokapratipattisādhanena vidyākarmapūrvaprajñānalakṣaṇena yukto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:843: tamākramaṃ paralokasthānāyonmukhībhūtaṃ prāptāṅkurībhāvamiva bījaṃ tamākramyāvaṣṭabhyā'śrityobhayānpaśyati bahuvacanaṃ dharmādharmaphalonekatvādubhayaprakārānityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:845: na tu punaḥ sākṣādeva pāpmanāṃ darśanaṃ saṃbhavati tasmātpāpaphalāni duḥkhānītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:848: yāni ca pratipattavyajanmaviṣayāṇi kṣudradharmādharmaphalāni dharmādharmaprayukto devatānugrahādvāpaśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:854: yadādityādibāhyajyotiṣāmabhāve 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇasaṃgātaḥ puruṣo yena vyatiriktenā'tmanā jyotiṣā vyavaharatītyuktam tadeva nāsti /
GV05brupsb4u:859: yathoktaṃ sarvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyedarthamāha-sa yaḥ prakṛta ātmā yatra yasminkāle prasvapiti
GV05brupsb4u:860: prakarṣeṇa svāpamanubhavati tadā kimupādānaḥ kena vidhinā svapiti saṃdhyaṃ sthānaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:862: asya dṛṣṭasya lokasyajāgaritalakṣaṇasya sarvāvataḥ sarvamavatīti sarvāvānayaṃ lokaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghāto viṣayavedanāsaṃyuktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:864: sarvā vā bhūtabhautikamātrā asya saṃsargakāṇabhūtā vidyanta iti sarvavānsarvāneva
GV05brupsb4u:869: svayaṃ nirmāya nirmāṇaṃ kṛtvā vāsanāmayaṃ svapnadehaṃ māyāmayamiva /
GV05brupsb4u:871: svenā'tmīyena bhāsā mātropādānalakṣaṇena bhāsā dīptyā prakāśena sarvavāsanātmakenāntaḥkaraṇavṛkkiprakāśenetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:872: sā hi tatra viṣayabhūtā sarvavāsanāmayī prakāśate /
GV05brupsb4u:874: tena svena bhāsā viṣayabhūtena svena ca jyotiṣā tadviṣayiṇā viviktarūpeṇāluptadṛksvabhāvena tadbhāvarūpaṃ vāsanātmakaṃ viṣayīkurvanprasvapiti
GV05brupsb4u:878: nanvasya lokasyamātropādānaṃ kṛtaṃ kathaṃ tasminsatyatrāyaṃ puraṣaḥ svayañjyotirbhavatītyucyate /
GV05brupsb4u:881: tenaiva cātrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotirdarśayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:883: yadā punaḥ sā bhā vāsanātmikā viṣayabhūtopalabhyamānā bhavati tadāsiḥ kośādiva niṣkṛṣṭaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:888: na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti /
GV05brupsb4u:892: na tatra veśāntāḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ sravantyo bhavanti /
GV05brupsb4u:895: BrhUpBh_4,3.10 nanvatra kathaṃ puruṣaḥ svayañjyotiryena jāgarata iva grāhyagrāhakādilakṣaṇaḥ sarve vyavahāro dṛśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:897: tatra kathaṃ viśeṣāvadhāraṇaṃ kriyate 'trāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotirbhavatīti /
GV05brupsb4u:900: iha tu svapn indriyābhāvāttadanugrāhakādityādyālokābhāvācca viviktaṃ kevalaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:902: nanu tathaiva viṣayā upalabhyante svapne 'pi yathā jāgarite tatra kathamindrāyābhāvādvailakṣamyamucyate iti /
GV05brupsb4u:903: śṛṇu- na tatra liṣayāḥ svapne rathādilakṣaṇāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:904: tathā na rathayogā ratheṣu yujyanta iti rathayogā aśvādayastatra na vidyante /
GV05brupsb4u:908: ucyete-nanūktamasya lokasya sarvāvato mātrāmapādāya svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāyetyantaḥkaraṇavṛttirasya lokasya vyavatiṣṭhate taducyate svayaṃ nirmāyeti /
GV05brupsb4u:910: natu tatra karaṇaṃ vā karaṇānugrāgakāṇivā'dityādijyotīṃṣi tadavabhāsyā vā rathādayo viṣayā vidyante /
GV05brupsb4u:913: tathā na tatrā'nandāḥ sukhaviśeṣā mudo harṣā putrādilābhanimittāḥ pramudasta eva prakorṣopetāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:915: tathā na tatra veśāntāḥ palvalāḥpuṣkariṇyastaḍāgāḥ sravantyo nadyo bhavanti /
GV05brupsb4u:919: tasya kartṛtvaṃ na tu sākṣādeva tatra kriyā saṃbhavati sādhanābhāvāt /
GV05brupsb4u:921: na ca tatra hastapādādīni kriyākārakāṇi saṃbhavanti /
GV05brupsb4u:922: yatka tu tāni vidyante jāgarite tatrā'tmajyotiravabhāsitaiḥkāryakaraṇai rathādivāsanāśrayāntaḥkaraṇavṛtyudbhavanimittaṃ karma nivartyate tenocyate sa hi karteti /
GV05brupsb4u:923: taduktamātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣā'ste palyayate karma kuruta iti /
GV05brupsb4u:924: tatrāpi na paramārthataḥ svataḥ kartṛtvaṃ caitanyajyotiṣo 'vabhāsakatvavyatirekeṇa /
GV05brupsb4u:925: yaccaitanyātmajyotiṣāntaḥkaraṇadvāreṇāvabhāsayati kāryakaraṇāni sadavabhāsitāni karmasu vyāpriyante kāryakaraṇāni tatra kartṛtvamupacaryata ātmanaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:931: śukram ādāya punar aiti sthānaṃ hiraṇmayaḥpuruṣa ekahaṃsaḥ // BrhUp_4,3.11 //

GV05brupsb4u:951: nikṛṣṭaṃ taduccāvacamīyamāno gamyamānaḥ prāpnuvanrūpāṇi devo dyotanāvānkurute nirvartayati

GV05brupsb4u:969: prasiddhirapi loke vidyate svapna ātmajyotiṣo vyatiriktatve /

GV05brupsb4u:972: nūnaṃ te paśyanti jāgraddehādindriyadvārato 'pasṛtya kevalo bahirvartata iti yata āhustaṃ nā'yataṃ bodhayediti /
GV05brupsb4u:973: tatra ca doṣaṃ paśyantibhṛśaṃ hyasau bodhyamānastānīndriyadvārāṇi sahasā pratibodhyamāno na pratipadyata iti /
GV05brupsb4u:974: tadetadāha-durbhiṣajyaṃ hāsmai bhavati yameṣa na pratipadyate yamindriyadvāradeśaṃ yasmāddeśācchukramādāyapasṛtastamindriyadeśameṣa ātmā punarna pratipadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:976: tata āndhyabādhiryādidoṣaprāptau durbhaṣajyo duḥkhabhiṣakvarmatā hāsmai dehāya bhati duḥkhena cikitsanīyo 'sau deho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:978: svapno bhūtvātikrānto mṛtyo rūpāṇīti tasmātsvapne svayojyotirātmā /
GV05brupsb4u:979: atho api khalvanya āhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa yaḥ svaraḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:980: na saṃdhyaṃ sthānāntaramihalokaparalokābhyāṃ vyatiriktaṃ kiṃ tarhīhaloka eva jāgaritadeśaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:983: yadā jāgaritadeśa evāyaṃ svapnastadāyamātmā kāryakaraṇebhyo na vyāvṛttastairmiśrībhūtaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:984: ato na svayañjyotirātmetyataḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvabādhanāyānya āhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:985: tatra ca hetumācakṣate jāgaritadeśatve yāni hi yasmāddhastyādīni padārthajātāni jāgrajjāgaritadeśe paśyati laukikastānyeva supto 'pi paśyatīti
GV05brupsb4u:990: taduktaṃ na tatra rathā na rathayogā ityādi /
GV05brupsb4u:997: ato vidyāniṣkriyārthaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmītyāha janakaḥ so 'hamevaṃ bodhitastvayābhagavate tubhyaṃ sahasraṃ dadāmi /
GV05brupsb4u:1000: itastvāṃ niyokṣyāmi samastakāmapraśnanirṇayaśravaṇena vimokṣāyāta ūrdhvaṃ brūhīti /
GV05brupsb4u:1005: sa vā eṣa etasmin saṃprasāde ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāyaiva /
GV05brupsb4u:1006: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1013: yattūktaṃ svpano bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati mṛtyo rūpāṇīti /
GV05brupsb4u:1017: karmaṇo hi mṛtyoḥ kāryaṃ modatrāsādi dṛśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1018: yadi ca mṛtyunā baddha evāyaṃ svabhāvatastato vimokṣo nopapadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1021: atha svabhāvo na bhavati mṛtyustatastasmānmokṣa upapatsyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1022: yathāsau mṛtyurātmāyo dharmo na bhavati tathā pradarśanāyāta ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāya brūhītyevaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:1023: janakena paryanuyukto yājñavalkyastaddidarśayiṣayā pravavṛte - sa vai prakṛtaḥ svayañjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1024: eṣa yaḥ svapne pradarśita etasminsaṃprasāde samyakprasīdatyasminniti saṃprasādaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1025: jāgarite dehendriyavyāpāraśatasaṃnipātajaṃ hitvā kāluṣyaṃ tebhyo vipramukta īṣatprasīdati svapne /
GV05brupsb4u:1026: iha tu suṣupte samyakprasīdatītyataḥ suṣuptaṃ saṃprasāda ucyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1027: “tīrṇo hi tadā sarvān śokān““salila eko draṣṭe“ti vakṣyati suṣuptasthamātmānam /
GV05brupsb4u:1028: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde krameṇa saṃprannaḥ sansuṣupte sthitvā /
GV05brupsb4u:1030: svapnātsuṣuptaṃ pravivikṣuḥ svapnāvastha eva ratvā ratimanubhūya mitrabandhujanadarśanāditā taritvā vihṛtyānekadhā caraṇaphalaṃ śramamupalabhyetyarthaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1031: dṛṣṭvaiva na kṛtvetyarthaḥ puṇyaṃ ca puṇyaphalaṃ pāpaṃ ca pāpaphalam /
GV05brupsb4u:1034: yo hi karoti puṇyapāpe sa tābhyāmanubadhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1036: tasmātsvapno bhūtvā mṛtyumatikrāmatyeva na mṛtyumatikrāmatyeva na mṛtyurūpāṇyeva kevalam /
GV05brupsb4u:1048: tataḥ saṃprasādānuvabhottarakālaṃ punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ yathāgataṃ niścita āyo nyāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1049: ayanamāyo nirgamanaṃ punaḥ pūrvagamanaparītyena yadāgamanaṃ sa pratinyāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1054: nanu svapne na karoti puṇyapāpe tayoḥ phalameva kathamavagamyate tathā jāgarite yathā karotyeva svapne 'pi tulyatvāddarśanasyeti,
GV05brupsb4u:1055: ata āha sa ātmā yatkiñcittatra svapne paśyati puṇyapāpaphalamanvāgato 'nanubaddhastena iṣṭena bhavati naivānubaddho bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1056: yadi hi svapne kṛtameva tena syāttenānubadhyeta /
GV05brupsb4u:1060: na ca svapnadṛśaḥ āgaḥ śrutvā lokastaṃ garhati pariharati vā /
GV05brupsb4u:1062: ākhyātāraścasvapnal sahevaśabdenā'cakṣate hastino 'dya ghaṭīkṛtā dhāvantīva mayā dṛṣṭā iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1065: kāryakaraṇairmūrtaiḥ saṃśleṣo mūrtasya sa tu kriyāheturdṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1069: kāryakaraṇasaṃśleṣeṇa hi kartṛtvaṃ syātsa ca saśleṣaḥ saṅgo 'sya nāsti yato 'saṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1072: so 'haṃ bhagavate sahasraṃ dadāmyata ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāyaiva brūhi /
GV05brupsb4u:1076: sa vā eṣa etasmin svapne ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati buddhāntāyaiva /
GV05brupsb4u:1077: sa yat tatra kiñcit paśyaty ananvāgatas tena bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1082: BrhUpBh_4,3.16 tatrāsaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣa ityasaṅgatākartṛtve heturuktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1083: uktaṃ ca pūrvaṃ karmavaśātsa īyate yatra kāmamiti /
GV05brupsb4u:1084: kāmaśca saṅga'to 'siddho heturukto 'saṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1087: asaṅga evetyetaducyate- sa vā eṣa etasminsvapne va vā eṣa puruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1088: saṃpradātpratyāgataḥ svapne ratvā caritvā yathākāmaṃ dṛṣṭaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ceti sarvaṃ pūrvavat /
GV05brupsb4u:1091: yadi svapne saṅgavānsyātkāmī tatastatsaṅgajairdeṣairbuddhāntāya pratyāgato lipyeta //4,3.16//
GV05brupsb4u:1093: sa vā eṣa etasmin buddhānte ratvā caritvā dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca punaḥ pratinyāyaṃ pratiyony ādravati svapnāntāyaiva // BrhUp_4,3.17 //
GV05brupsb4u:1095: na lipyata evaṃ jāgaritasaṅgajairapu doṣānra lipyata eva buddhāntena tadetaducyate-
GV05brupsb4u:1096: sa vā eṣa etasminbuddhānte jāgarite ratvā caritvetyādi pūrvavat /
GV05brupsb4u:1097: sa yattatra buddhānte kiñcitpaśyatyanatvāgatastena bhavatyasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣa iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1098: nanu dṛṣṭvaiveti kathamavadhāryate karoti ca tatra puṇyapāpe tatphalaṃ ca paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:1100: ātmanaivāyaṃ jyotiṣā'sta ityādinā'tmajyotiṣāvabhāsitaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṅghāto vyavaharati tenāsya kartṛtvamupacaryate na svataḥkartṛtvam /
GV05brupsb4u:1103: iha tu paramārthāpekṣayopādhinirapekṣa ucyate dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpañca na kṛtveti tena na pūrvāparavyāghātāśaṅkā /
GV05brupsb4u:1104: yasmānnirupādhikaḥ paramārthato na karoti na lipyate kriyāphalena /

GV05brupsb4u:1109: tathā sa vā eṣa etasminsvapne sa vā eṣa etasminbuddhānta ityetābhyāṃ kaṇḍikābhyāmasaṅgataiva pratipāditā /
GV05brupsb4u:1110: yasmādbuddhānte kṛtena svapnānte gataḥ saṃprasanno 'saṃbaddho bhavati stainyādikāryādarśanāttasmāttriṣvapi sthāneṣu svato 'saṅga evāyam /
GV05brupsb4u:1114: etasmā antāya dhāvatīti ca suṣuptaṃ darśayiṣyati /

GV05brupsb4u:1117: tathāpi na kiñcidduṣyatyasaṅgatā hi siṣādhayiṣitā sidhyatyeva /
GV05brupsb4u:1118: yasmājjāgarite dṛṣṭvaiva puṇyaṃ ca pāpaṃ ca ratvā caritvā ca svapnāntamāgato na jāgaritadoṣāṇānugato bhavati //4,3.17//
GV05brupsb4u:1120: tad yathā mahāmatsya ubhe kūle anusaṃcarati pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb4u:1121: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etāv ubhāv antāv anusaṃcarati svapnāntaṃ ca buddhāntaṃ ca // BrhUp_4,3.18 //
GV05brupsb4u:1122: BrhUpBh_4,3.18 evamayaṃ puruṣa ātmā svayañjyotiḥ kāryakaraṇavilakṣaṇastatprayojakābhyā
GV05brupsb4u:1123: kāmakarmabhyāṃ vilakṣa ṇo yasmādasaṅgo hyayaṃ puruṣo 'saṅtvādityayamarthaḥ“sa vā

GV05brupsb4u:1126: punaḥ svapn krameṇa buddhāntaṃ jāgaritaṃ buddhantācca punaḥ svapnāntamityevamanukmasaṃcāreṇa
GV05brupsb4u:1128: pūrvamapyupanyasto 'yamarthaḥ svapne bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati mṛtyo rūpāṇīti taṃ
GV05brupsb4u:1129: vistareṇa pratipādya kevalaṃ dṛṣṭāntamātramavaśiṣṭaṃ tadvakṣyāmītyārabhyate- tattatraitasminyathāpradarśiter'the
GV05brupsb4u:1130: dṛṣṭānte 'mupādīyate-yathā loke mahāmatsyo mahāṃścāsau matsyaśca nādeyena srotasāhārya ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1131: srotaśca viṣṭambhayati svacchandacāryubhe kūle nadyāḥ pūrvaṃ cāparaṃ cānukrameṇa saṃcarati /
GV05brupsb4u:1136: dṛṣṭāntapradarśanaphalaṃ tu mṛtyurūpaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātaḥ saha tatprayojakābhyāṃ kāmakarmabhyāmanātmadharmoyaṃ cā'tmaitasmādvilakṣaṇa iti vistarato vyākhyātam //4,3.18 //
GV05brupsb4u:1138: tad yathāsminn ākāśe śyeno vā suparṇo vā viparipatya śrāntaḥ saṃhatya pakṣau saṃlayāyaiva dhriyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1139: evam evāyaṃ puruṣa etasmā antāya dhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:1140: yatra supto na kaṃ cana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kaṃ cana svapnaṃ paśyati // BrhUp_4,3.19 //
GV05brupsb4u:1141: BrhUpBh_4,3.19 atra ca sthānatrayānusaṃtāreṇa svayañjyotiṣa ātmanaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātavyatiriktasya
GV05brupsb4u:1142: kāmakarmabhyāṃ vivaktatoktā svato nāyaṃ saṃsāradharmavānupādhinimittameva tvasya
GV05brupsb4u:1144: tatra ca jāgratsvapnasuṣuptasthānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ viprakīrṇarūpa ukto na puñjīkṛtyaikatra darśitaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1147: suṣupte punarbuddhāntamāgato buddhāntācca suṣupte saṃprasanno 'saṅgo bhavatītyasaṃgatāpi dṛśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1148: ekavākyatayā tūpasaṃhrayamāṇaṃ phalaṃ nityamuktabuddhaśuddhasvabhāvatāsya naikatra puñjīkṛtya pradarśiteti tatpradarśanāya kaṇḍikā'rabhyate
GV05brupsb4u:1149: suṣupte hyevaṃrūpatāsya vakṣyamāṇā“tadvā asyaitadaticchandā apahatapāpmābhayaṃ rūpāmi“ti /
GV05brupsb4u:1151: tatkathamityāha-dṛṣṭāntenāsyārthasya prakaṭībhāvo bhavatīti tatra dṛṣṭānta upādīyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1152: tadyathāsminnākāśe bhautike śyeno vā suparṇo vā /
GV05brupsb4u:1154: yathā'kāśe 'sminvihṛtya viparipatya śrānto nānāparipatanalakṣaṇena karmaṇā parikhinnaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1155: saṃhṛtya pakṣau saṃgamayya pakṣau samyaglīyate 'sminniti saṃlayo nīḍo nīḍāyaiva dhriyate
GV05brupsb4u:1157: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta evamevāyaṃ puruṣa etasyā etasmai antāya dhāvati /
GV05brupsb4u:1158: antaśabdavācyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ yatra yasminnante supto na kañcana na kañcidapi kāmaṃ kāmayate /
GV05brupsb4u:1159: tathā ca na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:1160: na kañcana kāmiti svapnbuddhāntayoraviśeṣeṇa sarvaḥ kāmaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1163: jāgarite 'pi yaddarśanaṃ tadapi svapnaṃ manyate śrutirata āha-na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyatīti /
GV05brupsb4u:1164: tathā ca śrutyantaram“tasya traya āvasathāstrayaḥ svapnāḥ“iti /
GV05brupsb4u:1165: yathā dṛṣṭānte pakṣiṇaḥ paripatanajaśramāpanupattaye svanīḍaupasarpaṇamevaṃ jāgratsvapnayoḥ
GV05brupsb4u:1166: kāryakaraṇasaṃyogajakriyāphalaiḥ saṃyujyamānasya pakṣiṇaḥ paripatanaja iva śramo
GV05brupsb4u:1167: bhavaci tacchmāpanuttaye svātmano nīḍāmāyatanaṃ sarvasaṃsāradharmavilakṣaṇaṃ sarvakriyākārakaphalāyāsaśūnyaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:1170: tā vā asyaitā hitā nāma nāḍyo yathā keśaḥ sahasradhā bhinnas tāvatāṇimnā tiṣṭhanti /
GV05brupsb4u:1171: śuklasya nīlasya piṅgalasya haritasya lohitasya pūrṇāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:1172: atha yatrainaṃ ghnantīva jinantīva hastīva vicchāyayati gartam iva patati /
GV05brupsb4u:1173: yad eva jāgrad bhayaṃ paśyati tad atrāvidyayā manyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1174: atha yatra deva iva rājevāham evedaṃ sarvo 'smīti manyate /
GV05brupsb4u:1176: BrhUpBh_4,3.20 yadyasyāyaṃ svabhāvaḥ sarvasaṃsāradharmaśūnyatā paropādhinimittaṃ cāsya saṃsāradharmitvam /
GV05brupsb4u:1177: yannimittaṃ cāsya paropādhikṛtaṃ saṃsāradharmitvaṃ sā cāvidyā /

GV05brupsb4u:2306: BrhUpBh_4,4.15 yadā punaretamātmānaṃ kathañcitparamakāruṇikaṃ kañcidācāryaṃ prāpya
GV05brupsb4u:2307: tato labdhaprayādaḥ sannanu paścātpaśyati sākṣātkaroti svamātmānaṃ devaṃ dyotanavantaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:2308: dātāraṃ vā sarvaprāṇikarmaphalānāṃ yathākarmānurūpamañjasā sākṣādīśānaṃ sāvāminaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:2314: yadeśānaṃ devamañjasā'tmatvena paśyati na tadā nindati vā kiñcit /
GV05brupsb4u:2315: sarvamātmānaṃ hi paśyati sa evaṃpaśyankamasau nindyāt //4,4.15//
GV05brupsb4u:2318: tad devā jyotiṣāṃ jyotir āyur hopāsate 'mṛtam // BrhUp_4,4.16 //
GV05brupsb4u:2320: saṃvatsaraḥ kālātmā sarvasya janimataḥ paricchettā yamaparicchindannarvāgeva vartate 'hobhiḥ svāvayavairahorātrairityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2324: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ākāśaś ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2325: tam eva manya ātmānaṃ vidvān brahmāmṛto 'mṛtam // BrhUp_4,4.17 //
GV05brupsb4u:2326: BrhUpBh_4,4.17 kiñca yasminyatra brahmaṇi pañca pañcajanā gandharvādayaḥ pañcaiva
GV05brupsb4u:2327: saṃkhyātā gandharvāḥ pitaro devā asurā rakṣāṃsi niṣādapañcamā vā varṇā ākāśaścāvyākṛtākhyo
GV05brupsb4u:2329: yasminpratiṣṭhita etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa ityuktaṃ tamevā'tmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye 'haṃ na cāhamātmānaṃ tato 'nyatvena jāne /
GV05brupsb4u:2330: kiṃ tarhyamṛto 'haṃ brahma vidvānsannajñānamātreṇa tu martyo 'hamāsaṃ tadapagamādvidvānahamamṛta eva //4,4.17//
GV05brupsb4u:2332: prāṇasya prāṇam uta cakṣuṣaś cakṣur uta śrotrasya śrotram manaso ye mano viduḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2333: te nicikyur brahma purāṇam agryam // BrhUp_4,4.18 //
GV05brupsb4u:2334: BrhUpBh_4,4.18 kiñca tena hi caitanyātmajyotiṣāvabhāsyamānaḥ prāṇa ātmabhūtena prāṇīti tena prāṇasyāpi prāṇaḥ sa taṃ prāṇasya prāṇam /
GV05brupsb4u:2336: brahmamaśaktyodhiṣṭhitānāṃ hi cakṣurādīnāṃ darśanādisāmarthyaṃ svataḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭasamāni hi tāni caitanyātmajyotiḥśūnyāni /
GV05brupsb4u:2337: manaso 'pi mana iti ye viduścakṣuradāvyāpārānumitāstivaṃ pratyāgātmānaṃ na viṣayabhūtaṃ ye viduste nicikyurniścayena jñātavanto brahma purāṇaṃ cirantanamagryamagre bhavam /
GV05brupsb4u:2341: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati/ BrhUp_4,4.19 //
GV05brupsb4u:2343: tatra ca darśanaviṣaye brahmaṇi neha nānāsti kiñcana kiñcidapu /
GV05brupsb4u:2351: virajaḥ para ākāśād aja ātmā mahān dhruvaḥ // BrhUp_4,4.20 //
GV05brupsb4u:2355: anyena hyanyatpramīyata idaṃ tvekamevāto 'prameyam dhruvaṃ nityaṃ kūṭasthamavicālītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2361: yathā'nyāni vastūnyāgamanirapekṣaiḥ pramāṇairviṣayīkriyante na tathaitadātmatatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa viṣayīkartuṃ śakyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2362: sarvasyā'matve kena kaṃ paśyedvijīnāyaditi pramātṛpramāṇādivyāpārapratiṣedhenaivā'gamo 'pi vijñāpayati na tvabhidhānābhidhelakṣaṇavākyadharmāṅgīkaraṇena
GV05brupsb4u:2371: anyātbhāvanivṛttāvātmabhāvaḥ svātmani svābhāviko yaḥ sa kevalo bhavatītyātmā jñāyata ityucyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2374: virajo vigatarajo rajo nāma dharmādharmādimalaṃ tadrahita ityetat /
GV05brupsb4u:2375: paraḥ paro vyatiriktaḥ sūkṣmo vyāpī vā'kāśādapyavyākṛtākhyāt /
GV05brupsb4u:2376: ajo na jāyate janmapratiṣedhāduttare 'pi bhāvavikārāḥ pratiṣiddhāḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2381: tam eva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2382: nānudhyāyād bahūñ chabdān vāco viglāpanaṃ hi tad iti // BrhUp_4,4.21 //
GV05brupsb4u:2383: BrhUpBh_4,4.21 tamīdṛśamātmānameva dhīro dhāmānvijñāyopadeśataḥ śāstrataśca prajñāṃ śāstrācāryopadiṣṭaviṣayāṃ jijñāsāparisamāptikarīṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2386: tatra bahutvapratiṣedhātkevalātmakatvapratipādakāḥ svalpāḥ śabdā anujñāyante“omityevaṃ dhyāyatha ātmānam anyā vāco vimiñcatha“iti cā'tharvaṇe
GV05brupsb4u:2387: vāco viglāpanaṃ viśeṣeṇa glānikaraṃ śramakaraṃ hi yasmāttadbahuśabdābhidhyānamiti //4,4.21//
GV05brupsb4u:2389: sa vā eṣa mahān aja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu /
GV05brupsb4u:2390: ya eṣo 'ntar hṛdaya ākāśas tasmiñ chete /
GV05brupsb4u:2399: eṣa setur vidharaṇa eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya /
GV05brupsb4u:2400: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena /
GV05brupsb4u:2402: etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti // BrhUp_4,4.22 //
GV05brupsb4u:2403: BrhUpBh_4,4.22 sahetukau bandhamokṣāvabhihitau mantrabrāhmaṇabhyāṃ ślokaiśca punarmokṣasvarūpaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:2404: vistareṇa pratipāditamevametasminnātmaviṣaye sarvo vedo yathopayukto bhavati tattathā
GV05brupsb4u:2406: tacca tathāsminprapāṭhake 'bhihitaṃ saprayojanamanūdyātraivopayogaḥ kṛtsnasya vedasya kāmyarāśivarjitasyetyevamarthaṃ uktārthānuvādaḥ sa vā eṣa ityādiḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2408: ko 'sāvuktaḥ parāmṛśyate taṃ prati nirdiśati ya eṣa vijñānamaya iti /
GV05brupsb4u:2412: uktaṃ hi pūrvaṃ janakapraśnārambhe kataṃ ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣvityādi /
GV05brupsb4u:2413: etaduktaṃ bhavati yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣvityādinā vākyena pratipāditaḥ svayañjyotirātmā
GV05brupsb4u:2415: para evāyaṃ nānya ityeṣa sa sākṣānmahānaja ātmetyuktaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2417: ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaye hṛdayepuṇḍarīkamadhye hṛdayapuṇḍarīkamadhye ya eṣa ākāśaḥ para evā'tmā nirupādhiko vijñānamayasya svasvabhāstasminsvasvabhāve paramātmanyākāśākhye sete /
GV05brupsb4u:2421: uktaṃ caitasya vā akṣarasya praśāsana iti /
GV05brupsb4u:2422: na kevalaṃ vaśī sarvasyeśāna īśitā ca brhamendraprabhṛtīnāmīśitṛtvaṃ ca kadācijjātikṛtaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:2423: yathā rājakumārasya balavattarānapi bhṛtyānprati tadvanmā bhūdityāha sarvasyādhipatiradhiṣṭhāya
GV05brupsb4u:2428: yo hi yamadhiṣṭāya pālayati sa taṃ pratīṣṭa eveti prasiddham /
GV05brupsb4u:2430: kicānyatsa evaṃbhūto hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā śāstravihitena karmaṇā bhūyānbhavati na vardhate pūrvāvasthātaḥ kenaciddharmeṇa
GV05brupsb4u:2431: no eva śāstrapriṣiddhenāsādhunā karmaṇā kanīyānalpataro bhavati pūrvāvasthāto na hīyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2432: kiñca sarvo hyadhiṣṭhānapālanādi kurvanparānugrahapīḍākṛtena dharmādharmākhyona yujyate 'syaiva tu kathaṃ tadabhāva iti /
GV05brupsb4u:2433: ucyate-yasmādeṣa sarveśvaraḥ sankarmaṇo 'pīśituṃ bhavatyeva śīlamasya tasmānna karmaṇā saṃbandhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2440: ato lokānāmasaṃbhedāya setubhūto 'yaṃ parameśvaro yaḥ svayañjyorātmaiva /
GV05brupsb4u:2442: kijyetiriyaṃpuruṣa ityevamādiṣaṣṭhaprapāṭhakavihitāyāmetasyāṃ brahmavidyāyāmevaṃphalāyāṃ kāmyaikadeśavarjitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ karmakāṇḍaṃ tādarthyena vaniyujyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2443: tatkathamityucyate-tametamevabhūtamaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ vedānuvacanena mantrabrāhmaṇādhyayanena nityasvādhyāyalakṣaṇena vividiṣanti veditumicchanti / ke /
GV05brupsb4u:2449: ya punarmantrabrāhmaṇalakṣaṇena vedānuvacanena prakāśyamānaṃ vividaṣantīti vyācakṣate teṣāmāraṇyakamātrameva vedānuvacanaṃ syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:2450: na hi karmakāṇena para ātmā prakāśyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2456: yadā vedānuvacanaśabdena nityaḥ svādhyāyo vidhīyate tadopaniṣadapu gṛhītaiveti vedānuvacanaśabdārthaikadeśo na parityakto bhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:2465: tathā hyātharvaṇe-“viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyate niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ“iti smṛtiśca-“jñānamutpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayātpāpasya karmaṇaḥ“ityādiḥ
GV05brupsb4u:2466: kathaṃ punarnityāni karmāṇi saṃskārārthānītyavagamyate“sa ha vā ātmayājī yo vededaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me 'nenāṅgamupadhīyate“ityādiśruteḥ
GV05brupsb4u:2467: sarveṣu ca smṛtiśāstreṣu karmāṇi saṃskārārthānyevā'cakṣate 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśatsaṃskārā ityādiṣu /
GV05brupsb4u:2468: gītāsu ca-“yajño daina tapaścaiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām /
GV05brupsb4u:2472: saṃskṛtasya ca viśuddhasatvasya jñānotpattirapratibandhena bhaviṣyatyato yajñena vividiṣṭi /
GV05brupsb4u:2475: kāmānaśanamanāśakaṃ na tu bhojananivṛttiḥ bhojananivṛttau mriyata eva nā'tmavedanam /
GV05brupsb4u:2477: evaṃ kāmyavarjitaṃ nityaṃ karmajātaṃ sarvamātmajñānotpattidvāreṇa mokṣasādhanatvaṃ pritapadyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2479: evaṃ yathoktena nyāyenaitamevā'tmānaṃ viditvā yathāprakāśitaṃ munirbhavati mananānmuniryogī bhavatītyartha /
GV05brupsb4u:2483: kitvanyavedane na munireva syātkiṃ tarhi karmyapi bhavetsaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2484: etaṃ tvaupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ viditvā munireva syānna tu karmī /
GV05brupsb4u:2486: etasminhi vidite kena kaṃ paśyedityevaṃ kriyāsambhavānmananameva syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:2487: kiñcaicamevā'tmānaṃ svaṃ lokamicchantaḥ prārthayantaḥ pravrājinaḥ pravrajanaśīlāḥ pravraḍanti prakarṣeṇa vrajanti sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasyantītyarthaḥ
GV05brupsb4u:2488: etameva lokamicchanta ityavadhāraṇānna bāhyalokatrayepsūnāṃ pārivrājyodhikāra iti gamyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2489: na hi gaṅgādvāraṃ pratipitsuḥ kāśīdeśanivāsī pūrvābhimukhaḥ praiti /
GV05brupsb4u:2492: athastadarthibhiḥ putrādisādhanaṃ pratyākhyāya na pārivrājyaṃ pratipattuṃ yuktam /
GV05brupsb4u:2496: tasmādātmānaṃ cellokamicchaci yastasya sarvakriyoparama evā'tmavalokasādhanaṃ mukhyamantaraṅgam /
GV05brupsb4u:2501: yathā ca bāhyalokatrayārthinaḥ pratiniyatāni putrādīni sādhanāni vihatānyevamātmalokārthanaḥ sarvaiṣaṇānivṛttiḥ pārivrājyaṃ brahmavido vidhīyata eva /
GV05brupsb4u:2505: tadetatpārivrājye kāraṇamucyate- ha sma vai kila pūrvetikrāntakālīnā vidvāṃsa ātmajñāḥ prajāṃ karmāparabrahmavidyā ca /
GV05brupsb4u:2507: prajāṃ kiṃ? na kāmayante putrādilokatrayasādhanaṃ nānutiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2511: brahma taṃ parādādyo 'nyatrā'tmano brahma veda sarvaṃ taṃ parādādityaparabrahmadarśamapyapavadatyeva /
GV05brupsb4u:2517: kaḥ punasteṣāmabhiprāya ityucyate kiṃ prayojanaṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ prajayā sādhanena /
GV05brupsb4u:2521: ātmā ca nā'tmatvādeva na kenacitsādhanenotpādya āpyo vikāryaḥ saṃskāryo vā yadapyātmayājinaḥ saṃskārārthaṃ karmeti tadapi kāryakaraṇātmadarśanaviṣayameva
GV05brupsb4u:2526: na hi mṛgatṛṣṇikāyāmudakapānāṃ tadudakadarśī pravṛtta iti tatroṣaramātramudakābhāvaṃ paśyeto 'pi pravṛttiryuktā /
GV05brupsb4u:2527: evamasmākamapi paramārthātmalokadarśināṃ prajādisādhanasādhye mṛgatṛṣṇikādisame 'vidvaddarśanaviṣaye na pravṛttiryuktetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2528: tadetaducyate-yeṣāmasmākaṃ paramārthadarśināṃ no 'yamātmāśanāyādivinirmuktaḥ sādhvasādhubyāmavikāryo 'yaṃ lokaḥ phalamabhipratam /
GV05brupsb4u:2531: asādhyasya sādhanānveṣaṇāyāṃ hi jalabuddhyā sthala iva taraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:2533: tasmādetamātmānaṃ viditvā prvjeyureva brāhmaṇā na karmā'rabherannityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2535: ta evaṃ sādhyasādhanasaṃvyavahāraṃ nindanto 'vidvadviṣayo 'yamiti kṛtvā kiṃ kṛtavanta
GV05brupsb4u:2536: ityucyate-te ha sma kila putrāṣaṇāyāśca vistaiṣaṇāyāśca lokāṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha
GV05brupsb4u:2543: yasmātpūrve vidvāṃsaḥ prajādikarmabhyo nivṛttāḥ pravjitavanta ava tasmādadhunātanā api pravrajanti pravjeyurityevaṃ sambadhyamānaṃ na lokastityabhimukhaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GV05brupsb4u:2546: yathā'tmavedanasādhanatvena vihitānāṃ vedānuvacanādīnāṃ yathārthatvameva nārthavādatvaṃ tathā taireva saha paṭhitasya pārivrājyasyā'tmalokaprāptisādhanatvenārthavādatvamayuktam
GV05brupsb4u:2549: yathā putraiṇaivāyaṃ loko ḍayyo nānyena karmaṇā karmaṇā pitṛloka iti /
GV05brupsb4u:2554: di pārivrājyamanuṣṭheyamapi sadanyastutyarthaṃ syāddarśapūrṇamāsādīnāmapyanuṣṭhāyānāṃ stutyarthatā syāt /
GV05brupsb4u:2555: na cānyatra kartavyataitasmādviṣayārjñātā yata iha stutyartho bhavet /
GV05brupsb4u:2556: yadi punaḥ kvacidvidhiḥ parikalpyeta pārivrājyasya sa ihaiva mukhyo nānyatra sambhavati /
GV05brupsb4u:2557: yadapyanadhikṛtaviṣaye pārivrājyaṃ parikalpyate tatra vṛkṣādyārohaṇādyapu pārivrājyatkalpyeta /
GV05brupsb4u:2560: yadyayātmā loka iṣyate kimarthaṃ tatprāptisādhanatvena karmāṇyeva nā'bherankiṃ pārivrājyeneti /
GV05brupsb4u:2562: yamātmānamicchantaḥ pravrajeyuḥ sa ātmā sādhanatvena phalatvena cotpādyatvādiprakārāṇāmanyatamatvenāpu karmabhirna saṃbadhyate /
GV05brupsb4u:2563: tasmātsa eṣa neti netyātmāgṛhyo na hi gṛhyata ityādilakṣaṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2570: na hi cakṣuṣmānpathi pravṛtto 'hini kūpe kaṇke vā patati /
GV05brupsb4u:2577: ihāpi caitasyaiva paramānandasya brahmavitprāpyasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvantītyuktam /
GV05brupsb4u:2579: yasmātsarvaiṣaṇāvinivṛttaḥ sa eva neti netyātmānamātmatvenopagamya tadrūpeṇaiva vartate
GV05brupsb4u:2580: tasmādetamevavidaṃ neti netyātmabhūtamu haivaite vakṣyamāṇe na tarato na prāpnuta
GV05brupsb4u:2582: ke te ityucyate- ato 'smānnimittāccharīradhāraṇādihetoḥ pāpamapuṇyaṃ karmākaraṃ kṛtavānasmi
GV05brupsb4u:2583: kaṣṭaṃ khalu mama vṛttamanena pāpena karmaṇāhaṃ narakaṃ pratipatsya iti yo 'yaṃ paścātpāpaṃ
GV05brupsb4u:2584: karma kṛtavataḥ paritāmapaḥ sa enaṃ neti netyātmabhūtaṃ na tarati /
GV05brupsb4u:2585: yathātaḥ kalyāṇaṃ phalaviṣayakāmānnimittādyajñadānādilakṣaṇaṃ puṇyaṃ śobhanaṃ karma kṛtavānasmi /
GV05brupsb4u:2586: jato 'hamasya phalaṃsukhamupabhokṣya dehāntara ityeṣo 'pi harṣastaṃ na tarati /
GV05brupsb4u:2587: ubhe u haivaiṣa brahmavidete karmaṇī tarati puṇyapāpalakṣaṇe /
GV05brupsb4u:2588: evaṃ brahmavidaḥ saṃnyāsina ubhe api karmaṇo kṣīyate pūrvajanmani kṛte ye te cāpūrve ca nā'rabhyete /
GV05brupsb4u:2589: kiñca nainaṃ kṛtākṛte kṛtaṃ nityānuṣṭhānamakṛtaṃ tasyaivākriyā te api kṛtākṛte enaṃ na tapataḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2590: anātmajñaṃ hi kṛtaṃ phaladānenākṛtaṃ pratyavāyotpādanena tapataḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2591: ayaṃ tu brahmavidātmavidyāgninā sarvāṇi karmāṇi bhasmīkaroti“yathedhāṃsi samidvo 'gniḥ” ityādismṛteḥ /
GV05brupsb4u:2596: eṣa nityo mahimā brāhmaṇasya na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān /
GV05brupsb4u:2597: tasyaiva syāt padavittaṃ viditvā na lipyate karmaṇā pāpakeneti /
GV05brupsb4u:2598: tasmād evaṃvic chānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyati /
GV05brupsb4u:2607: so 'haṃ bhagavate videhān dadāmi mām cāpi saha dāsyāyeti // BrhUp_4,4.23 //
